laboratory_examinations.findings: Liver is homogenous with no focal lesions; pancreatic head shows fatty atrophy and a 2.5 cm cystic lesion unchanged; spleen has 1.7 and 1.0 cm hypodense cysts unchanged; kidneys normal with small hypodensity likely simple cysts; multiple sigmoid diverticula noted with mild wall thickening suggestive of chronic diverticular changes.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Previously seen mild fat stranding surrounding focal segment of the sigmoid colon appears resolved.
